intro: Randia patula, commonly known as the small randia, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of South America. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and often have a slightly hairy texture. The flowers are small, white or pale yellow, and appear in clusters, attracting various pollinators.
